changelog.title: BlackLogics v0.0.1
changelog.description: Initial public alpha version of BlackLogics. Basic drag-and-drop UI editor with foundational block logic system. Good for testing core features.

changelog.title: BlackLogics v0.0.3
changelog.description: Minor update focusing on internal fixes and preparation for feature rollout.

changelog.title: BlackLogics v0.0.4-alpha4
changelog.description: Added widgets icons, preliminary Web to APK export, improved UI and other small enhancements based on community feedback.

changelog.title: BlackLogics v0.0.5
changelog.description: May be final pre-1.0 release. Resource encryption, bottom sheet dialogs, UI overhauls, improved custom blocks, code generation upgrades, and enhanced AndroidX support.
